title.rendered: Dongyi Sourcing Ltd (DSL) targets $100 MN revenue by 2025

content.rendered:
DSL Blog

Recently, Dongyi Sourcing Limited (DSL) – a well-known buying house among the country’s garment exports – celebrated its first anniversary in a colorful event. In the grand event, Mofazzel Hossain Pavel, Managing Director of Dongyi Sourcing Ltd., set an ambitious US$100 million revenue collection target by 2025.

Mofazzel Hossain urged all the officers and employees of Dongyi Sourcing Limited to work passionately to meet the target. He also expressed his gratitude to those who have been working as partners with Dongyi Sourcing.

The grand event was held at a hotel in Dhaka, where the officials and staff of the company celebrated the 1st anniversary. Prominent industrialist and Dhaka North Mayor Atiqul Islam were present as the Chief Guest on the occasion.

Among others, Md. Sirajul Haque, Managing Director of Sparkle Knit; Shahadat Hossain, Managing Director of Fratis Group; Nazrul Islam, Director of Well Group; Delwar Hossain of Delicate Group and other officials of Dongyi Sourcing Ltd. were present on the occasion.

source: Textile Today
